name: Parkour Game (PSV Games Studio)
description:
This is a classic parkour game.

In this game you have to jump between platforms carefully so as not to end up falling into the void or being damaged by water, the game has a third person view, many plants and bushes that move realistically and running on almost any PC (game very light), in this game several knowledge was applied to make it beautiful and very light to play.

This game is undoubtedly one of the best I've done !!

Leave your like and share with your friends (:

#other #retro #action #adventure #strategy #arcade #survival #puzzle #platformer
